data.title: Shahid, Kriti’s untitled movie wraps filming, to release in Oct 2023
data.meta_description: MUMBAI: Actors Shahid Kapoor and Kriti Sanon's upcoming movie has concluded production, the makers announced on Saturday.Backed by Jio Studios and Dinesh Vijan's Maddock Films, the romance drama is written and directed by Amit Joshi and Aradhana Sah.
data.text:
MUMBAI: Actors Shahid Kapoor and Kriti Sanon’s upcoming movie has concluded production, the makers announced on Saturday.

Backed by Jio Studios and Dinesh Vijan’s Maddock Films, the romance drama is written and directed by Amit Joshi and Aradhana Sah.

Maddock Films shared the news of production wrap on the project and also revealed the movie will be released in theatres in October this year.

“An impossible love story! announce the wrap of their untitled film starring Shahid Kapoor & Kriti Sanon together for the first time ever!” the banner wrote alongside a poster of film. A Maddock film’s production, the movie is also produced by Jyoti Deshpande and Laxman Utekar. It will also feature veteran actors Dharmendra and Dimple Kapadia in pivotal roles. (PTI)
